house_listing.house_description: This single family home built in 1999 has 5 bedroom(s), 4 bath(s) , 2 car garage. Rooms include dining room, master bedroom. Features include view, private pool, patio, fireplace.
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Breakfast Bar, Breakfast Room, Cable TV, Cathedral/Vaulted Ceilings,Ceiling Fan(s), Dishwasher, Game Room, Garage Door Opener, Great Room,Microwave, Pantry
